descriptionHtml:
Armor is standalone! No longer replaces Nightingale; now called 'Wolverine Armor'.
Feel free to rename, as the set is unenchanted.
All three pieces can only be crafted at the SkyForge ith Leather & Leather Strips.
All three pieces can be improved at a Workbench with said materials.

**************************************************
Description:This is a Blue and Yellow variant of the Nightingale armor set based on Wolverine's Costume , utilizing the Sleeveless Variant meshes.
(Huge thanks to QuickFox for their work on the Sleeveless Variant, respectively.)
**************************************************
This is for Male Only.

**************************************************

Installation:
Simply extract the archive into the Skyrim folder, so the .esp, textures folder, and meshes folder all land into your skyrim/data directory.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim


Credits:
QuickFox for his work and knowledge on transparencies.
author: wanoo99
